actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to prohibit nonessential educational transportation in recognition of the current energy crisis.

summary.text: Prohibits local educational agencies from implementing a plan of desegregation for a school year which would involve an increase in the gasoline consumed by such agency during the preceding school year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to prohibit nonessential educational transportation in recognition of the current energy crisis.
